name: node-red-contrib-multi-flows-storage

scripts.local: rm -rdf dist && npx tsc && cp package.module.json dist/package.json && ln -s node_modules dist/node_modules
scripts.prod: rm -rdf dist && npx tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json && cp package.json README.md dist/

description: A Node-RED storage plugin that organize flows and subflows in folders as YAML or JSON for readability
